name: BARRAGE (itch) (Chromatic Window, Nobongo, Zach Northrop)
description:
Defend your core from oppressive bombardments of debris in this exciting base-building strategy game!

How To Play:

  • Use Keys 1-3 to select a Building
  • Rotate it with Scroll or Q and E, then press LMB to place it down on the field
  • Use these buildings to defend your core
  • Destroy Debris, or your own buildings, by holding RMB on them to collect more Resources
  • Build Siphons to grow your core, once it's big enough, you'll win!
